name: Bot the builder PE
description:
Say hello to Bot the Builder, your own personal Minecraft Bot. Ready and waiting to obey your commands. He can connect to your Minecraft game and:

- Build anything from walls to beautiful buildings and structures (checkout the screenshot)
- Dig holes as big and deep as you ask
- Teleport players
- Kick or Ban griefers
- List information about the world
- List Co-ordinates for you and other players
- Many more commands in development, your bot will get smarter with every update

But that's not all. Bot the Builder can connect into our multiplayer network and host your server so upto 30 players can join you. You can make these servers public or private. No fee's to host your server, no recurring charges, no subscriptions. And theres even voice chat so you can concentrate on crafting rather then typing.

Bot the Builder is ready and waiting to serve!


[NOTE: This application will require you to install a VPN profile and connect to our network via the VPN. Only game related traffic will pass over the VPN, all your other traffic will pass over your normal network connection. This application requires you to have either the free or paid version of Minecraft PE]. Game centre login required to Host servers or access bot logic.

(If you have any issues, please contact us via our website form! We've yet to find anyone who's issue we've not been able to fix!)

Disclaimer – This is a third party App, it is not the game MineCraft or affiliated with the game and its makers in anyway.
